data.title: Nobel Prizes In Literature Go To Olga Tokarczuk And Peter Handke
data.meta_description: The Swedish Academy made the unusual move Thursday of recognizing both Handke, an Austrian writer, and Tokarczuk, who is Polish, after scandal prevented the committee from awarding a prize last year.
